results.name: a(n) = (n^4 + 5*n^3 + 11*n^2 + 7*n)/6.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (5,-10,10,-5,1).
formula: G.f.: x*(x^2 - x + 4)/(1 - x)^5. - _Petros Hadjicostas_, Jul 26 2020
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Feb 20 2020
